t: Amazon: brand value 2024 | Statista
s: In 2024, Amazon's brand value increased by 23 percent, standing at 577 billion U.S. dollars. In 2023, the value recorded the only decline since 2015.

t: Amazon slips to third-most valuable brand
s: As lockdown-era surges in online shopping began to recede and stabilize, Amazon grew 3% year-on-year, for a total brand value of more than $705 billion in Kantar BrandZ Most Valuable Global Brands 2022 - a massive valuation.

t: r/ValueInvesting on Reddit: Many iconic brands have been running a negative tangible book for years.
Amazon Return on Tangible Equity 2010-2024 | AMZN | MacroTrends
s: Current and historical return on tangible equity values for Amazon (AMZN) over the last 10 years. Return on tangible equity can be defined as the amount of net income returned as a percentage of shareholders equity, after subtracting intangible assets, goodwill and preferred equity.

t: What is Brand Equity? Why it's Important and How to Build It | Amazon Ads
s: August 6, 2024 - On the other hand, brand equity encompasses brand awareness along with other factors like perceived quality, brand loyalty, associations, and overall value of your brand. Brand equity is the tangible and intangible value your brand holds based on consumers’ perceptions and experiences.

t: Amazon reclaims title as USA’s most valuable brand, despite losing brand value | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: March 30, 2023 - View the full Brand Finance US 500 2023 report here  · Amazon has retaken top spot as the USA’s most valuable brand despite its brand value falling 15% this year from US$350.3 billion to US$299.3 billion. Amazon was previously the world’s most valuable brand from 2018 to 2020.

t: Prime Position: Amazon Named World’s Most Valuable Retail Brand | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: June 27, 2023 - Amazon has once again been named the world’s most valuable retail brand, with a brand value of US$299.3 billion, according to leading brand valuation consultancy, Brand Finance. This is more than double the brand value of Walmart (brand value up 2% to US$113.8 billion).

t: The effect of investment in the brand value chain on profitability and market value of the firm: lesson of success taken from Amazon | Future Business Journal | Full Text
s: This study aims to contribute to the existing business strategy literature by exploring how brand-building activities contribute to the firm's value by analyzing the direct and indirect effect of investment in the brand value chain on brand resonance, profitability, and market value.
